# selectedCells

**Instance Property**

An array containing all of the matrix’s highlighted cells plus its selected cell.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedCells: [NSCell] { get }
```

## Discussion

See the class description for a discussion of the selected cell.

As an alternative to using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix/setSelectionFrom(_:to:anchor:highlight:)] for programmatically making discontiguous selections of cells in a matrix, you could first set the single selected cell and then set subsequent cells to be highlighted; afterwards you can access [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix/selectedCells] to obtain the selection of cells.

## Related Documentation

- **isHighlighted**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell has a highlighted appearance.

## Finding Cells

- **selectedColumn**: The column number of the selected cell.
- **selectedRow**: The row number of the selected cell.
- **cell(atRow:column:)**: Returns the cell at the specified row and column.
- **cell(withTag:)**: Searches the receiver and returns the last cell matching the specified tag.
- **cells**: An array containing the cells of the matrix.
